sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AuthenticationHelper</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Client callable utility functions for authentication.</description> <name>AuthenticationHelper</name> <script><![CDATA[var AuthenticationHelper = Class.create(); AuthenticationHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { getInstanceURL: function() { return SNC.AuthenticationHelper.getInstanceURL(); }, type: 'AuthenticationHelper' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-08-27 05:30:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1d2b2ec5e72333002a0120c343f6a99a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AuthenticationHelper</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="OAuth 2.0" source="com.snc.platform.security.oauth">3c4dbc476d2220100acb70b353433044</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1d2b2ec5e72333002a0120c343f6a99a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-08-27 22:40:02</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>256</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
